text: Drew Dennis Dix (born December 14, 1944) is a United States military veteran. He was a major in the United States Army. He received the Medal of Honor for his actions in the Vietnam War. He was the first enlisted Special Forces soldier to receive the medal. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Majors in the United States Army Category:Military people from New York (state) Category:Purple Heart recipients Category:United States Army Medal of Honor recipients Category:People from West Point, New York
title: Drew Dennis Dix
